mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rappahannock River Virginia, from Fredericksburg to Near Moss Neck / from a trigonometrical survey under the direction of A.D. Bache, Superintendent of the Survey of the Coast of the United States ; triangulation by Capt. W.R. Palmer, Topl. Engrs. U.S.A. Assistant ; topography by John Seib Assistant ; hydrography by the party under the command of Lieut. R. Wainwright U.S.N. Assist., 1856

United States Coast Survey.

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown by hachures; depths shown by isolines, soundings and shading.
"Verified, M.L. Smith, Capt. Topl. Engrs. Asst. in charge of Office."
Oriented with north to upper right.
Includes notes on soundings in upper right corner.
